projects.name: Labellab | Google Summer of Code 2020
projects.description: LabelLab is a web-based, highly scalable and efficient Image labeling and project management tool for researchers for the primary purpose of path tracking of objects. My primary field of focus is around developing a scalable and reliable backend for the app, making project management tool and developing a labeller tool and containerizing the entire application using Docker and deploying it to the Google Cloud Platform.

projects.name: Cultural Society Website
projects.description: Developed the website for the Cultural Society of IIT Roorkee under the aegis of Design Studio. The website incorporates the concepts of the Content Management System. It is developed with a full-fledged dashboard where various cultural group members can add various information about their group and upcoming events along with an archive for maintaining memories of previous events. Currently the website is under a Non-Disclosure Agreement.

projects.name: Noticeboard
projects.description: It is the official notice-publishing portal of the institute used by the authorities and faculties alike to convey important notices by the administration or any other authority to the masses of the institute.

projects.name: Slambook
projects.description: It is a web based slambook for the final year students of the insitute to cherish their long years at the college by sending and receiving virtual slams and memories in the form of photos.

projects.name: Hidev - Social Network for Developers
projects.description: Made a social networking app for developers with the ability of building your own circle of developers, your portfolio, share/like/dislike posts, images and profiles and much more.

projects.name: Live-Streaming app
projects.description: Made a live-video streaming app during the campus hackathon organised by SDS Labs based on the concepts of RTMP servers and open-source based broadcasting channels.
